storyInfo: Gravel has come back to Kazimierz for the first time in a long while. In a pub, she rescues a foreign girl being pursued, and this girl's life turns out wildly unusual.

attributes.content: Scary Martin Bar
(Jingle)
Welcome...
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Help... help me!
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: Get back here! Seize her!
attributes.name: Strange Hunter

attributes.content: Oh, my poor door... only just fixed the day before.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: A knight... any knight, please help me...
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: Hmph, you think a knight's going to save you here?
attributes.name: Strange Hunter

attributes.content: Look around you! It's just a run-down bar pretending it's got anything to do with knights!
attributes.name: Strange Hunter

attributes.content: And no knight would never pay you any attention, besides.
attributes.name: Strange Hunter

attributes.content: Someone, I'm begging you, help me, please... don't let him take me... don't let him sell me!
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: That's not for you to say. Get an earful of this, bar-goers! 'Chattel' that's already been marked up wants to flee, and wants a knight's help on top of it?
attributes.name: Strange Hunter

attributes.content: Shout your lungs out for all I care, see who comes to save you! Get over here already!
attributes.name: Strange Hunter

attributes.content: No, I... I was tricked, I'm not 'chattel' or anything! I didn't want to come to Kazimierz, I want to go home...
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: Ha-ha. Look at this dumb little girl from a village with no name.
attributes.name: Strange Hunter

attributes.content: A make-believe story tricked you, that's what. Wanting to go to Kawalerielki to be a knight? And you came right along like an idiot... that's just comedy!
attributes.name: Strange Hunter

attributes.content: Might as well, while I'm here. Server, I'll have a glass for the road, then I'll take this girl with me, sell her to some old knight as a servant...
attributes.name: Strange Hunter

attributes.content: Sorry, friend. We don't take too kindly to hunters doing shady business 'round here.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...Come again?
attributes.name: Strange Hunter

attributes.content: You were saying we don't get knights in here. Selling our little establishment here short, I think. After all, we've got the bigshot, Sir 'Brassrust Knight' Ingra, sitting right here.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: B-Brassrust... you mean, THAT Brassrust Knight...!
attributes.name: Strange Hunter

attributes.content: (What? Hold on, boss, I only came here to drink. This equipment is just merch...)
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight Fan

attributes.content: (Glare)
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: (A—A'ight...)
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight Fan

attributes.content: '*belch*... *hack*. Rowdy wretch. A piffling dirt-wallowing bounty hunter thinks to cross me?'
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight Fan

attributes.content: 'Out of my sight.'
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight Fan

attributes.content: Grr... hear that? Come with me, before you ruin a major Knight's day!
attributes.name: Strange Hunter

attributes.content: Psia mać, is there anyone here who can kindly show this villain to the door?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: N-No... I don't want to go with...
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: No, no, I don't want to be someone's servant, I just want to go home... ah!
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: Do licha, what's the holdup? With me, now...!
attributes.name: Strange Hunter

attributes.content: Guh... agh...!
attributes.name: Strange Hunter

attributes.content: Who... *cough*, *hackpth*!
attributes.name: Strange Hunter

attributes.content: Noisy, noisy~. What's the order of the day in here?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Skurwysyny, sneaky asshole... ggh...!
attributes.name: Strange Hunter

attributes.content: And who gave you a license to stomp around Kawalerielki like that?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Phew... good we had a helping hand. Would've had a hard time saving the merchandise on my own.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Is it... over now? B—Being a knight fan sure pays off sometimes, haha...
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight Fan

attributes.content: You're...
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: What, has Kawalerielki been so quick to forget me?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Marcin, I used to come here quiiiite often.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Your technique... and then your arm here... a 'barcode', is it?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: I remember, now... It's you. 'Gravel'. You're a Maypole family Knight.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Gravel... Knight?
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: You can call me Gravel. It's what I go by, you know. Not any kind of stiffed-up title.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Knight? *snort*, a Knight attacking her opponent from behind. Using cheap tricks for assassins, too.
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight Fan

attributes.content: Real knights should be like Sir Ingra, with massive strength, unstoppable force, and a name with the power to drop your guts!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight Fan

attributes.content: So awkward I have to tell you this, Marcin's customer, but unlike those big stars made of money in the arena, my techniques all come from honest-to-gosh survival.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: You hate the competition knights, is that it? *snort*, all you campaign knights do is drain taxpayer money...
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight Fan

attributes.content: Break it up, break it up.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: This hunter boy's not waking up for a while. Lass, you find yourself an escape.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Right, and you haven't thanked Gravel for her bravery.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Th-Thank you so much.
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: You're that Gravel, then...
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: Hm? Don't tell me I'm famous.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I've-I've heard about how y-you came to our village once! A lot of bounty hunters operate close by, and it's so far from anywhere else, so the knights barely ever come to help drive them away...
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: Old stuff, then... I've been to plenty of places, looking for clues. That was all years ago, though.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: And you look pretty young. There's no way you could've met me back then... Who are you, hm?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: She's still in a state of shock. Don't you frighten her. Let her wind down some.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Gravel. Been a long time.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Long time and no see, Marcin. Is the master of the house still regular here these days?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Hah hah, you know he's not crazy for places like this, full of people. Last I heard, he fell in the lake and broke a leg angling, and now it's been an age since he dropped by to try himself some snacks.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Perfect. I'll have a round of what he hasn't eaten.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: You're not gonna treat the lass to something?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: I'm the girl who saved her life. Why am I paying for her meal on top of it?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: G—Gravel, I...
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: Mmn... fine, you just sit down next to me here. Marcin, I'll have two portions.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Thank you, good Knight...!
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: So, what've you come back for this time?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: I'm just on vacation, seeing how the master of the house's holding up after his dive. Two days before I have to head back.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Back? Back where? You're a Knight of Kazimierz. It's wherever your family's Knight Primus lives that you go on back to.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Hmm? But I've left Kazimierz at this point...
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Where you go, what you do, and who you want to become are all your freedom.
attributes.name: Gekoski

attributes.content: So long as you believe, your decisions will justify all that you've striven, and won't ever sully your name.
attributes.name: Gekoski

attributes.content: So go, Gravel.
attributes.name: Gekoski

attributes.content: No doubt about it... I already told him about my decision, and I even gave you a goodbye.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: You oldies and your forgetfulness. I bet I fell out of your heads straight away, didn't I?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Hah hah, I'm getting on in years for sure. Gets hard to remember so many things.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: (...No. Marcin's reaction... something's odd about it.)
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: (Something so huge happened, and now he forgets it...?)
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Gravel Knight, the 'master of the house' you mention is...
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: A name to know for sure. The Maypole family's Knight Primus Gekoski. He used to be a lynchpin of a campaign knight.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: The young Knights now'd have a shout in hell of investing what the Maypole family did, back in those days.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: *snort*. Don't forget, though, he's just old news now...
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight Fan

attributes.content: For having offended your family and Knight Primus... I apologize, Knight.
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight Fan

attributes.content: Next time, there won't be a time for sorries.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Uh... dgh. Boss, bill!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight Fan

attributes.content: Gravel Knight, is that Maypole family Knight someone... you really respect?
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: Mmhm, of course. It was with his blessing I didn't end up like the other 'chattel', stuck in the lowest of all work.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I could only become a Knight because of the training he gave me.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: How nice... having a chance to become a Knight. If... if I could be one too, then maybe I'd be able to return home and see my mom and dad again...
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: Have you been marked with a chattel serial number yet?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I-I haven't... I got away midway through.
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: That was brave of you. Well done.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Will it—make trouble for you helping me, Gravel Knight? I... I know hunters don't like being messed with...
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: Not to worry. Filthy business like this should've vanished long ago.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: (No, more than that. In fact, it should've already completely vanished.)
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: (Let's just see for now...)
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: This bounty hunter won't dare try anything with you again, and you're not currently 'chattel.' No one will get in your way. Rush back home, hm?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I... can't actually return, Miss Gravel.
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: I have no money, and besides, I don't know where my home even is...
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: Isn't it right in Kazimierz? Just mention the village name, and...
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I-I'm not from here... when I was tiny, I was kidnapped and brought to a Kazimierz village.
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: Go home? Alright, where do you call home? Of all of Kazimierz's villages, which is it?
attributes.name: Gekoski

attributes.content: It's... It's not...
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Gekoski

attributes.content: ...I'm... not from here.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Then tell, young lady. Just where is it you come from?
attributes.name: Gekoski

attributes.content: ...I... don't know.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I forgot everything.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I—I wanted to escape, but I already forgot where I even came from...
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: And then one day, a hunter told me he could take me to find a Knight, and they'd bring me home, and if I was lucky I could become a Knight myself.
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: So I was... taken to Kawalerielki. I only learned afterwards that they were planning to sell me, and make me serve someone else.
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: But that's not what I want to do! I want to go home! What I heard was he could take me to find a Knight, to take me home...
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: Leaving Kazimierz by herself, finding her hometown and her parents, that's just asking far too much of a young kid.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Grr. I know.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: (Of course I know. I couldn't be any clearer about this.)
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: That thing on your arm... isn't it a 'barcode'?
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: Surely that doesn't mean, you...?
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: Yes... it's true.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Unlike you, I never had even the chance to flee the hunters, and I got sold straight off. My one bit of luck is the old man who bought me was beyond charitable, without a doubt.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Even so, becoming a Knight was all your own effort. From commoner to a campaign knight... anyone knows why that ain't an easy time.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: That's amazing. So you really can become one...
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: After you became a Knight, did you ever return to your home to see your parents?
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: I miss them so much. I want to see my mom and dad again...
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: I never found them.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: I once went to a village, where you once happened to be. Maybe because I was searching for clues about those hunters, wanting to find out where they took me from.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: But... I never found anything.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: No. None of this is real.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Gravel... Knight?
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: Don't drag me into the whirlpool of memories again. All this is... it's what I always, always feared happening most.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: If I hadn't met the master of the house, if I hadn't become a Knight, if I'd never found my family... just what kind of state would I end up in?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: But I've known, since long ago, that none of it will ever trouble my heart again.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Gravel, what are you talking about?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: And you, Marcin, you too. It could never miss you that I'd left Kazimierz, joined Rhodes Island... That's right, I came back from 'Rhodes Island.'
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I know... Can tell from a quick look in your eyes. You've come to say farewell to me.
attributes.name: Gekoski

attributes.content: I'm... going to Rhodes Island. To follow them.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Hmph. Have you already told them your name?
attributes.name: Gekoski

attributes.content: Not yet. I need to confirm for myself once more, whether or not they're deceiving me, whether they want to use me for evil.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Then go. To that Rhodes Island to see, and continue your hometown search as you do.
attributes.name: Gekoski

attributes.content: I know... you haven't given up on finding it. It is the right thing to do, Gravel.
attributes.name: Gekoski

attributes.content: Father, I...
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Stop.
attributes.name: Gekoski

attributes.content: It is just as we said those years ago, Gravel. Go. You were to leave sooner or later. As you are decisive in this moment, so there is little to long for.
attributes.name: Gekoski

attributes.content: Come back to Kazimierz, should you want to come back. And should you not... then do not be burdened, and go!
attributes.name: Gekoski

attributes.content: 'Rhodes Island'? Gravel, you're a Maypole family vassal, a fourth-order knight...
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: All that is... the past now, Marcin. I belong to Rhodes Island now.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: What this girl just told us, all of this is 'my' story.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I went unsaved by a Knight, was trafficked into Kazimierz, sold into Kawalerielki... and I didn't even know how to go about getting back home.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: But you got your own family in Kazimierz too. As a Maypole vassal, as a Knight, you must be so happy...
attributes.name: Runaway Girl

attributes.content: I am a vassal to the master of the house. I'll forever revere him, be grateful for him.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: But, the last thing he said to me... is that I shouldn't forever long for this place.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I left Kazimierz. Because I had a reason to. And it was time to find my own true home and parents.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Yes... this is all just a dream.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: And I know this, because there wouldn't ever be another child kidnapped into Kawalerielki.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Those ruthless scum dressing up in the skins of 'bounty hunters' were the last force in the trafficking business. As far back as I'd followed every village patrol and punished every hunter, they were already—
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: ...Unf... ugh.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: (This is... Rhodes Island?)
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Yes, Doctor.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: (So that really was just a dream.)
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: (I've been having similar dreams, one after another, but...)
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Sorry, it looks like I... fell asleep.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Hehe, are you worried about me?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Funny. I'm usually the one watching you. I never imagined I'd be in another's gaze.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I understand. I know you don't get distracted at work. You're just supervising me, making sure I'm doing my job properly, aren't you?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Ah~. Anyway, don't let me weigh on you. Go on, continue with your work.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Hm? That'd be dereliction of duty, wouldn't it, Doctor~
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: You really are cunning, Doctor.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: In Kazimierz, I'd hardly ever have the time to sleep. I'd dream so often... not that they were any good dreams.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Doctor, after losing your memory... have you ever felt helpless, or alarmed, maybe?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I do dream often. Of leaving my home, being brought to Kazimierz. I find all sorts of people to assist me, even my own dream 'me', hoping they can help me find my way home.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: But the thing is, every time I'm asked where my hometown is, I just...
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Even today, I still can't bring to mind where it is I came from. I only remember it was a place completely different from Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Poor, a backwater... fragile. The parents of mine who couldn't even protect their own child.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: But no matter what, all these years and years, I've wanted always to find my home, to return and see my parents. I don't know if they're well, or if they'd still remember me.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: How lucky of me, to be picked up by that old knight, to have a fate unlike the other 'chattel', to seize knighthood by my own efforts.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: But, I've never forgotten... why it is I became a Knight.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: The power to seek myself, the ability to protect others. And now, I have... protecting your life as my calling.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Aw~, are you embarrassed? It's alright, Doctor, I won't guess at what you're thinking. Right now, watching your every movement is the only function of these two eyes.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Just give me this chance, let me stay by your side to defend you, and that'll be fine.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Alright, you'd better head on back to work, Doctor~. Or perhaps, you wanted to learn about me, all especially?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: It's alright, Doctor. I'll be keeping you company for a very long time. When the time comes and you want to know, I'll tell you all about my past.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I'm even freer than I was, leaving Kazimierz and coming to Rhodes Island, and it lets me keep searching for my home.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Right now... it's in quiet interactions, like these, where I can be most at peace.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Although...
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: (We're at the point where I can sleep in the Doctor's office... I suppose that's a little privilege of mine?)
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: (Oh, right, I should invite the Doctor to go back to Kazimierz with me sometime.)
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: (Heh-heh... It always feels sooo lonely in my dreams, back in Kazimierz all by myself. Aww, poor me.)
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: (Uh-oh, and here I have the spare time to think about this at work. Really... what a mess I am.)
attributes.name: Gravel
